<h3 id="X31831">X(31831) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-ARA AND EHRMANN-SIDE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^10-7*(b^2+c^2)*a^8+2*(5*b^4+4*b^2*c^2+5*c^4)*a^6-4*(b^2+c^2)*(2*b^4-b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^4+4*(b^4-c^4)^2*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^3  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31831) = 3*X(51)-4*X(23411) = 2*X(389)-3*X(10127) = 3*X(428)-X(6243) = 5*X(1656)-3*X(11245) = X(1885)-3*X(18435) = 3*X(2979)+X(16659) = 3*X(5891)-X(6146) = 3*X(5907)-X(13403) = X(10116)-3*X(10170) = 6*X(10128)-5*X(15026) = 9*X(11459)-X(12289) = 3*X(11459)-X(12605) = 3*X(11459)+X(14516) = 3*X(11591)-X(13470) = 3*X(12022)-7*X(15056) = X(12289)-3*X(12605) = X(12289)+3*X(14516) = 3*X(12362)-2*X(13470) = X(12370)-3*X(15060) = X(12421)-3*X(14852)</b>
<p>X(31831) lies on these lines:
{5,6}, {30,5562}, {51,23411}, {64,550}, {69,7387}, {110,7542}, {140,184}, {156,6676}, {323,15559}, {343,10539}, {389,10127}, {394,23335}, {403,2888}, {428,6243}, {468,18350}, {524,5446}, {539,12241}, {542,11793}, {546,13142}, {1154,6756}, {1216,1503}, {1511,3530}, {1594,3410}, {1595,16266}, {1598,11898}, {1656,11245}, {1843,10263}, {1885,18435}, {1993,7403}, {2979,16659}, {3548,6090}, {3574,3850}, {3575,18436}, {3628,15806}, {4549,17845}, {5020,18951}, {5159,13561}, {5663,31829}, {5891,6146}, {5907,13403}, {5921,6643}, {5965,10110}, {6102,9825}, {6193,9818}, {6288,23047}, {6515,7529}, {6642,11411}, {6644,9908}, {6759,16618}, {6776,7393}, {7399,18445}, {7405,7592}, {7514,31804}, {7526,12301}, {7528,12160}, {7553,11412}, {9306,12359}, {9820,21243}, {10024,25740}, {10116,10170}, {10128,15026}, {11402,14786}, {11441,15760}, {11442,11585}, {11457,15066}, {11459,12289}, {11577,15738}, {11591,12362}, {11818,31802}, {12010,17713}, {12022,15056}, {12164,18420}, {12233,15083}, {12370,15060}, {13568,13754}, {14790,18440}, {15606,29012}, {16881,23410}, {19347,26926}</p>
<p>
X(31831) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3575, 18436}, {5562, 12134}, {7553, 11412}, {10625, 16655}, {12605, 14516}<br>
X(31831) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6102, 9825), (12362, 11591), (13142, 546), (13292, 5), (18914, 140)<br>
X(31831) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (68, 17814, 5), (155, 1352, 5), (15069, 17814, 68)<br>
</p>
